Macassar Ebony and Silver Wooden Ring

Macassar Ebony and Silver Wooden Ring

A beautiful and unique wooden ring made from carefully selected materials In our workshop in Scotland. The outer portion of this design consists of Macassar Ebony with a Sterling silver inlay. An inner layer of wood is made from Walnut.

$90
